title: save-analysis: enum variants are dumped as `VariableRefData` instead of `TypeRefData`
body:
### Code

``` rust
fn main() {
    let x = Some(42);
    match x {
        Some(y) => {},
        None => {}
    }
}
```
### CSV output

@nrc is this intentional? I realize an enum variant is not really a type, but I wouldn't say it is a variable ref either.
